page.topic: How to Run the Installer Unattended
page.description: The Universal Installer can be run without a UI when an automated installation is needed.

discussion.p: The Universal Installer can be run in unattended mode with a JSON configuration file containing the options that would normally be set in the Universal Installer UI.
This can be useful if an automated process is used to deploy a new server or update one or more servers.
